data.name: Hyparxis
data.detailed_description:
Continuous development through extremely high level limit


The level limit is so high that you can level and develop your characters almost without limits. You want to defeat every boss by sheer force? You can achieve all this through training.

character development


As you level up, you will receive points to improve your attributes and to unlock new skills. You can also increase the amount of skills that you can equip at the same time.

A multitude of skills

We want to give you the opportunity to fight your battles the way you want to. Whether with the help of elements or close combat, ranged combat etc. There are skills for many different areas to create the character you want.

Crafting


Another individualization option is the crafting of augmentations. Genetic improvements are the shit with higher developed species, so of course you want to profit from that too!

training room

So that you can prepare for your adventures at any time, there is a special arena in your home dimension with which you can create enemies that are designed to make you stronger. You can make them challenging to take a risk but possibly gain more XP or you can make them weak to achieve slow but steady progress.

The story

But for what all this? Well, you have a big task ahead of you. It is about nothing less than the structure of existence. You will learn that everything around you can be more fascinating than you thought. And you will discover that living beings accomplish incredible things when they interact with each other, both in a positive and negative sense.
And it is up to you to positively influence this outcome!

You will be confronted with philosophical concepts on your journey, and you will learn that sometimes there is a difference between an optimal and a good decision.

data.short_description: As an artificially created being with unlimited potential, explore the foundations and extensions of existence! Find friends and companions on this way, but take good care of them, because lives are fragile. Hyparxis is a turn-based, classic JRPG with unlimited character development.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU (2 x 2Ghz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 470/AMD R7 240
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU (4x3Ghz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
